thread.title: NA LCS Spring Split Week 2 [Jan 27 - Jan 29]
thread.title_full: NA LCS Spring Split Week 2 [Jan 27 - Jan 29]

author: Aznbeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: NA LCS Spring Split Week 2 [Jan 27 - Jan 29]
text:
The NA LCS returns with the second week of the 2017 Spring Split!
Continue reading for a spoiler free look at this week's games, including team info, schedules, and VODs!

( Please be aware that this post WILL BE UPDATED as the action continues throughout the week. VODs and any other pertinent info will be posted once available! ) 

2017 NA LCS Spring Week 2 
The  2017 NA LCS Spring Split  features North America's top ten teams -  Team Solomid, FlyQuest, Echo Fox, Cloud9, Team Envy, Team Liquid, Team Dignitas, Phoenix1 , Counter Logic Gaming , and Immortals - playing against each other for championship points and a chance to represent their region at the 2017 World Championship!

Be sure to read up on the  2017 LCS Spring Split Scheduling and Rules ! Catch up on the full NA LCS rules  here  or browse the 2017 season changes article here . As previously announced for all Riot run leagues, NA LCS is moving up to a 10 ban system.
LCS Spring Split Week 2  will be played on   patch 7.1 ! 

Standings: Here are the standings from Week 1 :

Stream: 
Stream link NALCS1 Twitch  //  Youtube  //  Azubu TV 

N/A

Schedule: 
Day 1 - January 27th - Beginning at 3:00 PM PST // 0:00 CET 
FlyQuest  vs.  Counter Logic Gaming 3:00 PM PST // 0:00 CET  [VODs when available]


TSM  vs.  Team Dignitas 6:00 PM PST // 3:00 CET  [VODs when available]

Day 2 - January 28th - Beginning at 12:00 PM PST // 20:00 CET 
Immortals  vs.  Cloud9 12:00 PM PST // 20:00 CET  [VODs when available]


Phoenix1  vs.  Team Envy 12:00 PM PST // 20:00 CET  [VODs when available]


TSM   vs.  Team Liquid 3:00 PM PST // 23:00 CET  [VODs when available]


Team Dignitas  vs.  Echo Fox 3:00 PM PST // 23:00 CET  [VODs when available]


Day 3 - January 29th - Beginning at 12:00 PM PST // 20:00 CET 
Phoenix1  vs.  Team Liquid 12:00 PM PST // 20:00 CET  [VODs when available]


Echo Fox   vs.  FlyQuest  12:00 PM PST // 20:00 CET  [VODs when available]


  Team Envy   vs.  Immortals 3:00 PM PST // 23:00 CET  [VODs when available]

Cloud9  vs.  Counter Logic Gaming 3:00 PM PST // 23:00 CET  [VODs when available] 

As always, feel free to check  LoLesports.com  for more information,  VODs , and  advanced scheduling !
